title: Riku wa Yowakunai
synopsis: Based on Sakagami's own life, the story follows the carefree daily lives of a 5-year-old and a puppy named Riku. In addition to the Italian greyhound Riku, the characters include the chihuahua Tsutomu, the miniature dachshund Yousuke, the French bulldog Maruchan, and the pug Paguz–æou.
staff: [['Arakawa, Masatsugu', ['Director']], ['Saitou, Yuu', ['Sound Director']], ['Sakagami, Shinobu', ['Original Creator']], ['Cookie!', ['Original Character Design']]]
